tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: In honor of #BHM, @HistoryAtState co-hosted a lecture titled "A History of African American Trailblazers in American Diplomacy." Historian Dr. Melissa Jane Taylor provided a history of African Americans @StateDept and how their actions fostered a more diverse diplomatic team.
